boundaries.boundaryW: 45 Links of Bandavu Veeravenkata Satyanarayana Land

sections.content: The property covered under Sale Deed No. 2901 of 1996, dated 30/Jul/1996, executed by Satyanarayana Mugallapu in favour of Valapu Reddy Sanyasi Rao, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 242.2 Sq. Yds., located Near by Door No. 103/4, Ward No. 18, comprised in survey numbers 143/2 and 143/3, situated in Undrajavaram Village, Gramapanchayat and Mandal, within the District of West Godavari, registered at sub-registrar office Tanuku is bounded as follows: North by: 64 Links of Executant Land South by: 89 Links of Executant Land East by: 46 Links of Bobbana Sankaram Land West by: 45 Links of Bandavu Veeravenkata Satyanarayana Land
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
